name: 伊万娜·辛
introduction: Ivana is a Toronto born playwright and actress. She studied playwriting at the National Theatre School of Canada and acting at The American Academy of Dramatic Arts. Ivana made her feature film debut in Lucky McKee's "The Woods" with Patricia Clarkson. The same year, she appeared in Mark Adam's award-winning film "Steel Toes" with David Strathairn. Other credits include Richard J. Lewis' Oscar nominated "Barney's Version" with Paul Giamatti and Dustin Hoffman and upcoming "Meadowland" with Olivia Wilde and Luke Wilson. Television credits include a recurring role on NBC's "Days of Our Lives" and CBS's "Person of Interest" and a lead in the award winning Hulu series "The Division".Her one woman play, "Faking It", debuted at the 'Just For Laughs Festival' in Montreal 2013, and made its U.S. debut in Los Angeles in November, 2014 at the Lounge Theater. Her play "Single" also premiered at The IAMA Theatre Fest in June of 2013, directed by Amir Arison. In June 2012, IAMA Theatre company had previously also workshopped her play, "The Lovers", now under current option to The Company Theatre in Toronto. Emmy award winning director Richard J. Lewis came aboard to "Faking It" for a subsequent production at The Comedy Central Stage in December, 2014.- IMDb Mini Biography By: RatPack
